title: Flames of Passion
description: SHE WOULD NOT, COULD NOT SELL HERSELFWith no money, no family and no home, Amber Kensington fled from the grimy London church and a bridegroom old enough to be her grandfather Then, terrified and exhausted, she fell into a doorway but her respite was brief. The rugged stranger who rescued her from the attentions of two drunken sailors, who tenderly carried her unconscious body to his ship, demanded an equally tender payment. He never thought that it was he who would pay. Forever. With all his heart and soul.
author: Flournoy
